Topic.Title: Is there a way to allow pages to have same name?

Posts.EditableText: is there a way to overwrite the code to allow pages to have the same name and also is there a way to copy and paste pages if I could figure this out it would make making my game a lot easier
Posts.HTML: is there a way to overwrite the code to allow pages to have the same name and also is there a way to copy and paste pages if I could figure this out it would make making my game a lot easier

Posts.EditableText:
Just change the alias.
```page1.alias = page2``` or something
Posts.HTML:
Just change the alias.
page1.alias = page2 or something

Posts.EditableText:
If you had multiple pages with the same name, how would the game know which one you mean?

It might be easier to answer this question if we had some idea why you would ever want to duplicate a name.
Posts.HTML:
If you had multiple pages with the same name, how would the game know which one you mean?

It might be easier to answer this question if we had some idea why you would ever want to duplicate a name.

Posts.EditableText:
Just type the name of the page at the top of the page.  This way, you can display whatever you want... you could have a hundred pages called 'Kitchen' as far as the player knows, but the actual page names need to be different for the game to actually work.

The software doesn't care what you type on the page itself.
Posts.HTML:
Just type the name of the page at the top of the page. This way, you can display whatever you want... you could have a hundred pages called 'Kitchen' as far as the player knows, but the actual page names need to be different for the game to actually work.

The software doesn't care what you type on the page itself.
